titles.title: MP904 O Lord I Want To Sing Your Praises

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O Lord I want to sing Your praises,
I want to praise Your name every day.
O Lord I want to sing Your praises,
I want to praise Your name every day.

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines:
And I will praise You as long as I live,
For Your love is better than life.
In Your name I will lift up my hands,
For Your love is better than life.
